body: Initializing _cached_specs every time binary_distribution::try_download_specs was called broke the install of cached dependencies because only the first one was placed in the cache. Move the initialization to the module level and only skip checking the mirrors if the spec exists in _cached_specs.
title: binary_distribution:  Initialize  _cached_specs  at the module level and only search the mirrors in get_spec if spec is not in _cached_specs.
